review_text: I was dragged to the show after my friends asked me to go for many months. Actually I was under a lot of stress from my job and finally decided to take a chance on seeing Wild Wild. The music chosen for the show and each performance helped create different atmosphere to cater to all the needs / dreams of the women who were watching. Now I can understand why many visitors return over and over again. Even as a foreigner, I didn''t feel like I missed out on the fun due to language barrier. I am thinking to go back with my friends for Bachelorette party soon! Worth the money and the cast are so kind and friendly too!
